com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol

Interface SmcIcon


  • public interface SmcIcon
    This interface contains information on icons in the Media Control package.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDepth()
      Get the number of color bits per pixel.
      int getHeight()
      Get the vertical dimensions of the icon in pixels.
      String getMimeType()
      Get the icon MIME type.
      Uri getUri()
      Get the URI of the icon.
      int getWidth()
      Get the horizontal dimensions of the icon in pixels.

    • Method Detail

      • getDepth

        int getDepth()
        Get the number of color bits per pixel.
        Returns:
        The color depth of the icon. This method returns -1 if the device is not able to generate icon information.

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Get the horizontal dimensions of the icon in pixels.
        Returns:
        The icon width. This method returns -1 if the device is not able to generate icon information.

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Get the vertical dimensions of the icon in pixels.
        Returns:
        The icon height. This method returns -1 if the device is not able to generate icon information.

      • getMimeType

        String getMimeType()
        Get the icon MIME type.
        Returns:
        The icon MIME type. This method returns an empty string if the device is not able to generate icon information.

      • getUri

        Uri getUri()
        Get the URI of the icon.
        Returns:
        The URI of the icon. This method returns null if the device is not able to generate icon information.
